plot: A waitress arrives for her first day of work at a bar, Nobody's Inn. She discovers that a mysterious yellow pill has strange effects on all the customers and she can do nothing but witness the surreal drama unfold before her eyes.
title: The Yellow Pill
plot_es: A waitress arrives for her first day of work at a bar, Nobody's Inn. She discovers that a mysterious yellow pill has strange effects on all the customers and she can do nothing but witness the surreal drama unfold before her eyes.
plot_en: A waitress arrives for her first day of work at a bar, Nobody's Inn. She discovers that a mysterious yellow pill has strange effects on all the customers and she can do nothing but witness the surreal drama unfold before her eyes.
